channel.title: ThinkShout
channel.description: ThinkShout - We provide web strategy and open source technology to forward-thinking organizations.

item.title: Session Voting is Open for the PNW Drupal Summit!
item.description:
Well, the PNW Drupal Summit session submission has drawn to a close and voting is now open! At ThinkShout, we’re really excited to be sponsoring this year and are looking forward to seeing the final session schedule after voting closes on August 27.

This year sessions submission topics included:

  • Development and Code
  • Community, Business and Project Management
  • Information Architecture and Administration
  • Design and Theming

 We’ll be bringing the whole team up this year, so be sure to check our session submissions when you have a chance:

  • Dynamic Layout in Management using JavaScript
  • Customizing the Apache Solr Search Experience
  • Drupal as Glue: Implementing Native CRMs in Drupal
  • Building Drupal Style Tiles using Foundation and SCSS
  • Creating and Customizing Zen Sub-Themes

Let the voting begin and we look forward to seeing you in Seattle October 20-21!
